name: 12 Space Diamonds
description:
Collect all 12 Diamonds of Space that are stuck in the very center of a black hole loop, in this fun space racer! Game made for Ludum Dare 47 (https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/12-space-diamonds)

Controls

  • W or gamepad right trigger - accelerate
  • S or gamepad left trigger - break
  • A, D or gamepad left joystick - rotate
  • X or gamepad X - stop rotation
  • Left mouse button or gamepad A - shoot at asteroids
  • ESC or gamepad START - pause

Notes

  • Avoid getting out of the loop, the black hole radiation will damage you!
  • Try to speedrun the game and post your times for all 12 levels!
